lamp_desc:
Looks really old and shiny
Right click to summon BK
teleport_spell_desc:
Moves you so fast, that you can't even notice that.
Tho, it's power is pretty random!
defense_potion_desc: Increases your defense by... quite a lot!
healing_potion_desc: You know your self, what it does
invis_potion_desc: Takes you to the world of shadows
ghost_leaver_desc: Leaves a copy of yourself, that looks like real!
defense_book_desc: Breaks armor of anyone, who touches the projectiles
dagger_desc: Doesn't do much damage, but slows everyone down
key_desc: A big and heavy iron key
dialog_bk_its_you_again: So it's you again? {WAIT}You think, you can changing something this time?
dialog_bk_its_not_worthit: It is not worth it! {WAIT}{SHAKE}YOU WILL NEVER DEFEAT ME.{ENDSHAKE} Let's just face the {SHAKE}truth.{ENDSHAKE}
